name: MLPchan Namefield Vidya Emoticons Pack
description: An MLPchan Vidya emoticons pack, originally just some personal additions to http://userstyles.org/styles/87605/mlpchan-namefield-pony-emoticons-pack , now put here so I can make more when I feel like it and not have to post the code for people to edit their Pony Emoticons Pack.
